‮وعن دينر ‮κ
‮ ‪κγ
‮وعن إبرهيم ν
‮فذلك ‪ϙχ
‮منه مدوّر ‪ζ‪‬
‪‮وبقي ‮α إردب ‬
‪‮الباقي له ‮‪κγχ‬ حمل پن بنوح ‪χ‬

له إردب بصسه

عن أرض بجوج

muʿawwiḏ:un 75
mudrikaẗu ʿani ăl ḥasani 5 waṣalat ʾilay hi
wa ʿan dīnāra ** 20
*** 23
wa ʿan ʾibrāhīma 50
fa ḏālika 90+1/2
min hu mudawwar:un 7*
wa baqiya **** 1 ʾirdabb ***
ăl bāqī la hu 23+2/3 ḥimlu bnu tanūḫa *+1/2
wa ʾaġlabu hu ʿan baǧūǧa ʾirdabb baqiya ***
la hu ʾirdabb:un bṣsh ***
wa qad yūṣalu ʾilà zarʿi faddāni qamḥ:in ***
ʿan ʾarḍi baǧūǧa ***

Muʿawwiz [sic] 75
[Mu]drika on behalf of al-Ḥasan 5 there has reached hi[m
and on behalf of Dînâr ... 20 [
[...].......... 23 [
and on behalf of Ibrahîm 50 [
That makes 90 1/2 [
Thereof round (wheat) 7[.] ... [
and there remained ....... 1 artabas[
The remainder to his credit 23 2/3 Ḥiml b. Tanûḫ [
and the main part on behalf of Beǧôǧ one artaba, there remains[
To him belongs one artaba ........ [
and for sowing one faddân there has arrived of wheat [
And on behalf of the land of Beǧôǧ [
